title: (x) The Getaway movie logo stencil face - (similar to) Helvetica Cond {Yves}
content:
Hi all!

Trying to identify the font used for the Steve McQueen movie “The Getaway”. I am guessing it’s a stencil version of a well known font, but can’t nail it down! ANy help greatly appreciated, as always. :)

Thanks,

Matt Atherton  
p.s. Apologies for the poor quality of the image, but it’s all I have for this old movie.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071016232731/http:/typophile.com/files/Font.jpg) | 27.06 KB |

 [‹ (x) Archinect logo - PMN Caecilia {James}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071016232731/http:/typophile.com/node/12989 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) type on playing cards - Card Characters {James} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071016232731/http:/typophile.com/node/12974 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fluiddruid23

comments.content: Looks close enough to a bold weight of Helvetica Condensed.

Thanks!

I have the font, raterised it and cut out the bits like a stensil. Perfect!

Matt
